label: I-26 Photo 1057
description: Road (presumably King Street Extn.) to Virginia-Carolina Chemical Corp. with its buildings in background, on site affected by the construction of Interstate 26 (I-26). Surveyor notations on back of photo: "Dkt.: 10.490. Property owner: V.C. Chemical Co. Tract: 1. Station: Panoramic view from North (see plans). Date: September 11, 1962. (For information.)" [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
